text: The Copperneedle River originates within the northern Hearne Domain, Western Churchill province of the Churchill craton, the northwest section of the Canadian Shield in Nunavut's Kivalliq Region. There are rapids along the river, approximately from Hudson Bay's Dawson Inlet. Copperneedle River is populated with Arctic char. The portion of the river near Southern Lake is part of the Beverly and Qamanirjuaq caribou range. ==See also== *List of rivers of Nunavut ==References== Category:Rivers of Kivalliq Region Category:Tributaries of Hudson Bay
title: Copperneedle River
